name: Sheep (itch) (MalikenGD)
description:
This was a 1 month project to make an idle mobile game. 

Download, Extract, and run the 'Sheep Inc' executable file to start playing.

Controls: 

Click to Spawn Sheep. Right click to exit UI Menus. Click on the tabs at the top of menus to navigate between sections.

Click one of the 4 regular barns to open the barn upgrading or prestiging interfaces.

Click the long barn to open the research interface.

Alt+F4 is the only way to quit. Progress/settings are saved on quit. 

The goal is to play until you can prestige (certain sheep count required). Then upon prestiging, you gain a 5x multiplier on the sheep's cash value, that way you can get further (as the prestige wipes all progress). 

White Sheep = 1 Sheep, Golden Sheep = 100 Sheep
